message.content:
cs.AR, cs.ET, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY

The paper discusses the tradeoffs between resource usage and error tolerance in computing systems, spanning multiple layers from circuit design to algorithms. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories. 

cs.AR (Computer Architecture) is the most likely category, as the paper specifically mentions digital system design and computer architecture. 

cs.ET (Emerging Technologies) is also likely, as the paper discusses the potential benefits of exploiting errors in computing systems, which could be considered an emerging technology. 

cs.SE (Software Engineering) and cs.PL (Programming Languages) are also possible categories, as the paper discusses the role of programming languages and system software in error tolerance. 

cs.SY (Systems and Control) is another possible category, as the paper discusses the tradeoffs between different layers of computing systems and the potential benefits of end-to-end approaches.
